link.title: Computerworld Archives: Back From Vintage Microfilm
link.desc: Archive.org now has nearly fifty years of Computerworld archives. The early ones are a fun read if you want to see some entertainingly large mainframes, or the slow rise of current big players in the tech world... https://archive.org/details/sim_computerworld_1979-10-08_13_41/page/52/mode/2up
